businessRules.rule: DECLARE @execname nvarchar(max)= @Arguments_Controller + @Arguments_CommandName + 'After' exec ValidateRequestPost @execname exec @execname @ApplicationCodeauto,@branch,@civilidst set @Result_NavigateUrl = 'webreportviwer.aspx?reportquery=' + @Arguments_Controller + '&idfilter=' + cast(@ApplicationCodeauto as nvarchar)
